page.title: 04MIDDLE HILL FARM
page.content: Middle Hill farm is positioned on a hill,hence the name.It covers 20.7 acres and has two fields,one of 8 and the other of 12.7 acres. The main crops grown are wheat and grass. Potatoes are however grown at the present time.The natural features of the farm are two ponds one holding one hundred thousand gallons and the other a million.Another of its features is a stream with a wood stretching along its banks. The owner of the farm is an Agriculural engineer.The animals which he keeps are chicken,cattle and a few sheep.He has two tractors and three cars (these are a D registration Morris van an X registration Austin van and a Volkswagon car).The farmhouse has four bedrooms and a kitchen.They also have an orchard.
